aixm:LinguisticNote.aixm:note: IRV DME reading refers to THR 18
IRV DME lasjums attiecas uz THR 18
Class II/D/3 (refer to LVP GEN 3.4.3 paragraph 1, AD 1.1.3 and EVRA AD 2.22 paragraph 4)
Klase II/D/3 (atsauce uz LVP GEN 3.4.3 1. punktu, AD 1.1.3 un EVRA AD 2.22 4. punktu)
Refer to LVP GEN 3.4.3 paragraph 1, AD 1.1.3 and EVRA AD 2.22 paragraph 4.
Atsauce uz LVP GEN 3.4.3 1. punktu, AD 1.1.3 un EVRA AD 2.22 4. punktu.
Only sked or charter flights or general aviation may operate at the aerodrome
H24, except for the periods 0500-0600 (0400-0500) and 2000-2100 (1900-2000) when only scheduled or charter flights or general aviation may operate at the aerodrome.
H24, izemot laika periodu no 0500-0600 (0400-5000) un no 2000-2100 (1900-2000), kad var tikt veikti tikai regulrie, rtera vai visprjs avicijas lidojumi.
Only sked or charter flights or general aviation may operate at the aerodrome
250, 4.8 NM from the centre of Riga
Apron 1 ACL: at Apron 34 FT Apron 2 ACL: at Apron 33 FT Apron 3 ACL: at Apron 33 FT Apron 4 ACL: at Apron 33 FT Apron 5 ACL: at Apron 32 FT Apron Z3 ACL: at Apron 29 FT
Perona 1 ACL: uz perona 34 FT Perona 2 ACL: uz perona 33 FT Perona 3 ACL: uz perona 33 FT Perona 4 ACL: uz perona 33 FT Perona 5 ACL: uz perona 32 FT Perona Z3 ACL: uz perona 29 FT
Anemometer: 370 m from THR 18, 380 m from THR 36, lighted (Ref. Table GEN 3.5.3)
Anemometrs: 370 m no THR18, 380 m no THR36, izgaismots (sk. tabulu GEN 3.5.3)
Diesel rotary uninterruptible power supply (DRUPS) device on each RWY substation / 0 SEC
Dinamisk neprtraukts baroanas iekrta (DRUPS) katra RWY apakstacij / 0 SEC
RWY 18/36: Designation, THR, TDZ, aiming point, CL, edge marked. RWY18/36: THR, TDZ, CL, RWY end, edge lighted.
RWY18/36: marti apzmjumi, THR, TDZ, galapunkts, CL, malas. RWY18/36: ar ugunm THR, TDZ, CL, RWY gals, malas.
Red, LIH at all RWY holding PSN RWY 18/36 guard lights at TWYs A, B, C, D, E, G, K and Y.
Sarkanas, augstas intensittes ugunis viss gaidanas viets pie skrejcea. RWY 18/36 aizsardzbas ugunis pie TWY A, B, C, D, E, G, K un Y.
